steps.title: Prep the Chicken
instructions: Flatten the chicken breasts to an even thickness (about 1/2 inch) using a meat mallet or rolling pin between two sheets of plastic wrap.
Season both sides with salt and black pepper.

steps.title: Dredge and Bread
instructions: Set up three shallow dishes: one with flour, one with beaten eggs, and one with a mixture of breadcrumbs and 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese.
Dredge each chicken breast in flour, dip in egg, then coat with the breadcrumb mixture.

steps.title: Fry the Chicken
instructions: Heat a generous amount of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Fry the breaded chicken breasts until golden brown on both sides and cooked through (about 4-5 minutes per side). Remove and drain on paper towels.

steps.title: Assemble and Bake
instructions: Spread a thin layer of marinara sauce in the bottom of a baking dish. Place the fried chicken breasts on top. Spoon more sauce over each chicken breast, then sprinkle with mozzarella and the remaining Parmesan cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven until the cheese is melted and bubbly, about 20 minutes.

steps.title: Garnish and Serve
instructions: Garnish with fresh basil leaves before serving. Serve your Chicken Parmesan with a side of cooked pasta or a mixed greens salad for a complete meal.
